meanings.sent1: The flower child was the hippiest person at the music festival.
meanings.sent2: She always wore the hippiest clothes with colorful patterns and flowing fabrics.
meanings.sent3: The hippiest dog in the park was wearing a tiny tie-dye bandana.
meanings.sent4: Her free spirit made her the hippiest soul in the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The smell of incense and patchouli followed the hippiest girl wherever she went.

meanings.sent1: The groovy van with peace signs was the hippiest vehicle in the parade.
meanings.sent2: He was voted the hippiest student in the yearbook for his love of nature and tie-dye shirts.
meanings.sent3: The hippiest cat in the neighborhood loved to nap in the sun all day.
meanings.sent4: The old hippie's stories were the hippiest tales ever told around the campfire.
meanings.sent5: The hippie festival was the hippiest event of the summer, with live music and tie-dye workshops.
